results.title: Breakdown
results.creator_credit: Ralph Strasser and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
results.brief_description: A man is stranded on a lonely country road. The events which take place on the second day drive him from boredom to panic, to desperation.

results.title: Break & enter
results.creator_credit: Amanda Brotchie, Melanie Coombs, Cinemedia Corporation and XYZ Entertainment
results.brief_description: A routine home invasion leads to a comedic exploration of gender and identity when a middle aged housewife swaps roles with the intruder who intended to rob her but was foiled by a frying pan. Cast includes Mark Peglar, Marion Heathfield and Robin Cummings with a music score by Mick Harvey.

results.title: Bread of eternal life
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the temple of Sanhedrin; Joseph of Arimathea, Nicodemus and Caiaphas; Judas visits with Zerah in his quarters in the temple; the last supper; Jesus breaks bread with his disciples and gives them the commandment of love; Jesus predicts he will be betrayed by Judas.

results.title: Bread is life
results.brief_description: The story of the Bread Research Institute of the CSIRO and what it does including: analysing flour samples and experimenting with proportion of gluten in the flour mix; experimenting with machines for making bread; methods of storing flour; analysing faulty loaves and offering advice to improve quality.

results.title: Brazing a lap joint
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Gas Welding”.
In brazing a lap joint, the film demonstrates the selection of the welding tip, and the application of flux to the join.

results.title: Brazil: the children of the miracle
results.creator_credit: Martin Smith, David Elstein and Thames Television
results.brief_description: Looks at the price Brazil is paying for its attempt to turn itself into one of the world’s great powers, by focusing on the city of Sao Paulo, where after fifteen yuears of the ‘economic miracle’, more than half the population lives below the poverty line. Families are so poor that 600,000 children have been abandoned. Presented by Jonathan Dimbleby.

results.title: Braze welding
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Gas Welding”.
Demonstrates the method of braze welding, a bonding process used to join similar or dissimilar metals by an alloy which has a lower melting point.

results.title: Brave Kate
results.brief_description: A violent puppet animated treatment of a 19th century Czech song in which Kate sets out to avenge the murder of her father. Displaying trmendous courage and resourcefulness she tracks the murderes and eliminates them one by one. Animated by Vlasta Pospisilova, Xenie Maresova and Alfons Mensdorff-Pouilly.
